author: thorsten
msg: Changing search against solr server to a new generator. Further adding a default query string to the generator so the crawler can build the search result page without addressing a query.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Fix for TUSCANY-909. Renamed CompositeContext.getCompositeName to getName and getCompositeURI to getURI to bring CompositeContext in compliance with the SCA Java C&I 0.95 spec. Changed the CompositeContext interface and its implementation in the kernel module.

author: thorsten
msg: Using root variable instead of the context.
